org.shared.array

Interface Matrix<T extends Matrix<T,E>,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the parameterization lower bounded by Matrix itself.
    E - the element type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Array<T,E>, Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplexArray, DerivativeOfGaussian, Gabor, GaborCircular, IntegralHistogram, IntegralImage, LaplacianOfGaussian, Mean, RealArray

    public interface Matrix<T extends Matrix<T,E>,E>
extends Array<T,E>
    Defines functionality that can be expected from all matrices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.shared.array.Array
